song.title: Way To Unity
song.info:
This song was composed specifically for Chaos Constructions 2015 (5th place in ZX Spectrum AY Music Competition). I thank the Russian scene for organizing events such as CC. THX !!!
- Platform: ZX Spectrum - Type of music: AY chip - Editor: Vortex Tracker - Stereo Format: ACB - Format for download: MP3 (8,6MB) - Year of publication: 2015
Caution !!! If it encounters you have any questions, comments or need any technical support, please contact me !!! Email: lamer.pinky@windowslive.com Facebook: Petr Pinky Klusal Twitter: Lamer Pinky Phone numb.: (+420) 732 424 922 (Czech republic)
Thank you so much for listening !! Speccy rulezzz 4ever !! :-)
